title: The Nanny Clich√©
description: Cara has been in love with Finn for years and has finally moved away to get on with her life.When he pursues her and begs her to come back to care for his abandoned son she cannot refuse. Grudgingly she returns to his house as Tom's nanny but her efforts to keep Finn at arm's length are thwarted by a new and unexpected chemistry that sizzles between them. Will Cara have the strength to resist him and if not what will be the price for giving into temptation?
author: Amy Deveux
